This event is not yet released on the Global server; the following information is based on translations which may not match the official English localization and will be updated when the Global release is announced.

Wrankwood: Act or Die

Wrankwood: Act or Die or simply Act or Die is the thirty-seventh Side Story in Arknights.

Contents

  • 1 Operations
    • 1.1 The Show Begins
    • 1.2 For Drama, For Eternity
  • 2 Additions
  • 3 Operators
    • 3.1 Headhunting
  • 4 Mysterious Black Shadow
    • 4.1 Onsite Entertainment Project
    • 4.2 Studio Self-Service Bar
  • 5 Store
  • 6 Outfits
  • 7 Furniture
  • 8 Miscellaneous
    • 8.1 Operator Records/Paradox Simulations
  • 9 Navigation

Operations[edit]

Clear 1-10 to access AD operations.

All AD operations are worth 28 .

Additions[edit]

New devices:

  • Film Camera
  • Lighting Equipment

New enemies:

Normal
Elite
Boss

Operators[edit]

  • The following Operators will gain 50% extra Trust (except from Annihilation):
  • Operator Modules added for Shaper Casters.
  • The following operators receives their second modules:
    • Mountain receives his FGT-X Module.
    • Ascalon receives her AMB-Y Module.
    • Dorothy receives her TRP-X Module.

Headhunting[edit]

Main article: Headhunting/Banners/Upcoming

The Dithyramb Unending headhunting banner is featured.

Store[edit]

  • Fresh Fastener & Rest Between Sets are now available in the Distinctions Store and Universal Certificates Exchange Area.
  • The following packs are available in the Packs Store, which can only be purchased once per account:

Supporter Chip Pack

Outfits[edit]

The following outfits are available in the Outfit Store until June 19, 2025:

New
Re-edition

Furniture[edit]

The Wrankwood Filming Studio furniture theme is available until June 19, 2025; some of its parts are obtained from Onsite Entertainment Projects while others are available from Studio Self-Service Bar and Furniture Store.

Miscellaneous[edit]
